title: BGG Data
text:
Loading historical data from BoardGameGeek (BGG) for predictive modeling and analysis.

Loads universe of game ids from bgg activity club
Submits batches of requests via bggUtils
Stores responses on BigQuery and Google Cloud Storage



Uses targets package to create pipeline





Show the code
targets::tar_visnetwork(targets_only = T)


Set default bucket name to 'bgg_data_dev'









batches of games requested from API


Show the code
list_games_objects = function(bucket, prefix = "raw/objects/games") {
    googleCloudStorageR::gcs_list_objects(
        bucket = bucket,
        prefix = prefix,
        versions = T,
        detail = "full"
    ) |>
        filter(name == prefix) |>
        arrange(desc(updated))
}

print_games_objects = function(obj) {
    obj |>
        select(bucket, name, generation, updated) |>
        knitr::kable(format = "markdown")
}

buckets = c("bgg_data", "bgg_data_dev", "bgg_data_staging")
games_objs <- map(
    buckets,
    ~ list_games_objects(bucket = .x)
)
names(games_objs) = buckets



ProductionStaging



games_objs$bgg_data |>
    print_games_objects()

1747834842219338
2025-05-21 13:40:42











What’s new on BGG?


Show the code
# get last two generations
gens <-
    games_objs$bgg_data |>
    arrange(desc(updated)) |>
    head(2) |>
    pull(generation)

# most recent gen
active_games <- load_games_from_bucket(
    bucket = "bgg_data",
    generation = gens[1]
)
previous_games <- load_games_from_bucket(
    bucket = "bgg_data",
    generation = gens[2]
)

# find games only in most recent batch
active_games |>
    anti_join(
        previous_games |>
            select(game_id)
    ) |>
    bggUtils:::unnest_info() |>
    select(game_id, name, yearpublished) |>
    arrange(desc(yearpublished)) |>
    knitr::kable(format = "markdown")

title: BGG Data
text: Uses targets package to create pipeline

title: BGG Data
text:
Show the code
targets::tar_visnetwork(targets_only = T)


Set default bucket name to 'bgg_data_dev'

title: BGG Data
text:
batches of games requested from API


Show the code
list_games_objects = function(bucket, prefix = "raw/objects/games") {
    googleCloudStorageR::gcs_list_objects(
        bucket = bucket,
        prefix = prefix,
        versions = T,
        detail = "full"
    ) |>
        filter(name == prefix) |>
        arrange(desc(updated))
}

print_games_objects = function(obj) {
    obj |>
        select(bucket, name, generation, updated) |>
        knitr::kable(format = "markdown")
}

buckets = c("bgg_data", "bgg_data_dev", "bgg_data_staging")
games_objs <- map(
    buckets,
    ~ list_games_objects(bucket = .x)
)
names(games_objs) = buckets

bgg_data_staging
raw/objects/games
1747834842219338
2025-05-21 13:40:42

title: BGG Data
text:
What’s new on BGG?


Show the code
# get last two generations
gens <-
    games_objs$bgg_data |>
    arrange(desc(updated)) |>
    head(2) |>
    pull(generation)

# most recent gen
active_games <- load_games_from_bucket(
    bucket = "bgg_data",
    generation = gens[1]
)
previous_games <- load_games_from_bucket(
    bucket = "bgg_data",
    generation = gens[2]
)

# find games only in most recent batch
active_games |>
    anti_join(
        previous_games |>
            select(game_id)
    ) |>
    bggUtils:::unnest_info() |>
    select(game_id, name, yearpublished) |>
    arrange(desc(yearpublished)) |>
    knitr::kable(format = "markdown")
